pageContext.claim: “Very sadly, Murder cases in Mexico in 2018 rose 33% from 2017, to 33,341. This is a big contributor to the Humanitarian Crisis taking place on our Southern Border and then spreading throughout our Country. Worse even than Afghanistan. Much caused by DRUGS. Wall is being built!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was quoting from something he saw on the Lou Dobbs show. Official Mexico statistics say the number of murders increased by 15.5 percent, from 28,866 to 33,341.
